Class Contact

java.lang.Object
Contact
public class Contact extends Object
Contains the contact/client information.

  • Method Details

    • cleanNumber

      public String cleanNumber(String number)
      Cleans up a String, isolating only the numbers. Example: "ab123deFG" returns "123" and "a1b2c3d4" returns "1234". Using Character.isDigit() may be helpful.
      Parameters:
      number - the String to be cleaned up
      Returns:
      the new String, made up of only numbers

    • getMessage

      public Message getMessage()
      gets a message if one is stored with the contact or null

    • setMessage

      public void setMessage(Message message)
      Stores a message object with the contact. Not the best way to do this. Instead a server should hold the messages
